'''Notes'''
Majority of hardware works well with 12.04 and 12.10 64bit out of box. 

Few things that are not working are:

* HDMI - there are some post on net how to make it working, but I didn't try to fix it. HDMI is not being recognised by control panel at all

* external micrphone - I didn't managed to successfully record using external microphone

* wifi - you need prioprietary drivers to have wireless.
